# This file was generated by FRUT's Jucer2CMake from "AudioPerformanceTest.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("AudioPerformanceTest")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED AudioPerformanceTest_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "AudioPerformanceTest_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(AudioPerformanceTest_jucer_FILE
  "${AudioPerformanceTest_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_FORMAT_VERSION "1"
  JUCER_VERSION "7.0.3"
  PROJECT_FILE "${AudioPerformanceTest_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "AKfc5m"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "AudioPerformanceTest"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  COMPANY_NAME "Raw Material Software Limited"
  COMPANY_COPYRIGHT "Raw Material Software Limited"
  USE_GLOBAL_APPCONFIG_HEADER OFF
  ADD_USING_NAMESPACE_JUCE_TO_JUCE_HEADER ON
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN OFF # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  PROJECT_TYPE "GUI Application"

)
